backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a workshop POS backend with inventory, service records, customer, and transaction management, using role-based access control via a MixinAuthorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: adding an Edit dialog for user roles/permissions on the User Data page, and fixing the authorization check for the Add Product button on the Products page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose, exports, and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for a neutral light/dark color theme used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Workshop POS Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Query, TanStack Router with all page routes, AuthProvider, and conditionally renders the login page or the main app layout.
frontend/src/components/customer/Custome: Dialog component for creating or editing a customer record, including fields for name, phone, discount settings, and a dynamic vehicle history list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainNav.t: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop and mobile nav links for all app routes, and a user avatar dropdown with logout, using TanStack Router and shop settings.
frontend/src/components/pos/CartLineItem: Stub component that renders nothing, kept only to prevent import errors from code that previously referenced the old cart component.
frontend/src/components/pos/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar component for the POS app with links to POS, Products, and History pages, plus a logout button and current user display.
frontend/src/components/transaction/Rece: Print-friendly receipt component that renders shop info, transaction details, cart items, and total in a monospace thermal-printer style layout using shop settings.
frontend/src/components/user/Permissions: Renders a checklist of user permissions with predefined role defaults, allowing toggling of individual permission checkboxes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication context provider managing workshop users with login/logout, CRUD operations, role migration, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Stub currency hook providing IDR formatting utilities for compatibility with legacy code.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: React Query hooks for customer data management including fetching all customers, searching by name, upserting, and deleting records via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to manage login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, and upserting inventory items via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedDraft.ts: Stub hook with no-op saveDraft and checkout functions, replacing the old draft persistence system.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosDraft.ts: Stub hook returning a no-op POS draft state and actions, kept for backward compatibility with legacy imports.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Stub hook returning an empty products list and no-op delete, replacing the old products system with inventory management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides standalone React Query hooks for CRUD operations on inventory items, customers, transactions, service records, and profit/loss reports, each using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReports.ts: Exports a single React Query hook that fetches a profit/loss report for a given date range from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useService.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the service queue, all service records, adding a new service record, and updating a service record's status.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopSettings.ts: Manages shop settings (name, address, phone, greeting, logo) persisted in localStorage, with a global listener pattern to keep all hook instances in sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransaction.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all transactions and adding a new transaction via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Stub hook that returns empty data and isLoading false, replacing the old transactions hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the current user's role from the backend and exposes convenience booleans for admin, user, kasir, and permission checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base/components/utilities imports and CSS custom properties for a warm amber/ochre light and dark theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDataPage.tsx: Customer management page supporting search, add/edit via modal, delete, and Excel import/export of customer records with WhatsApp link formatting.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Stub page component that renders nothing, replaced by ReportsPage in the current system.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Full inventory management page with a searchable table, add/edit dialog, delete confirmation, and CSV import/export for inventory items.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login form with username/password fields, calls the `useAuth` login hook, and displays validation errors or a loading spinner during submission.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Stub/placeholder component that renders nothing; replaced by TransactionPage in the workshop POS system.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Full CRUD inventory management page supporting add/edit/delete of products and services, with search filtering, CSV import/export, and role-based edit access.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays a profit/loss report by aggregating all transactions and inventory cost data, with date range filtering UI and a print capability.
frontend/src/pages/ServicePage.tsx: Service queue management page with a form to create new service records and a queue display, allowing status updates and navigation to the transaction page on completion.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shop settings page for editing store info (name, phone, address, receipt message) and uploading/removing a logo, persisted via the `useShopSettings` hook.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionPage.tsx: Checkout/transaction page that handles customer autocomplete, cart management (add/remove/update items), transaction submission, and receipt printing via window.print().
frontend/src/pages/UserDataPage.tsx: User management page allowing admins to add, edit, and delete users with role selection (Admin/User/Kasir) and a permissions checklist for fine-grained access control.
frontend/src/utils/excelUtils.ts: Utility functions for exporting inventory and customer data to CSV and importing/parsing CSV files back into typed inventory row objects with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both regular and hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the design system with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom border radii, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Workshop POS app's features, architectural notes, known issues (broken Admin add-product authorization), and pending feature requests.
